transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hanji sir.
Customer: Hanji madam bolo.
Executive: Ha sir bataiye.
Customer: Batao batao aap batao.
Executive: Nahi sir aapko matlab kuch problem thi to I thought ke sort out hogi na wo jo aapke account manager unhone bataya.
Customer: Nahi nahi mere ko kuch problem nahi thi main ye keh raha tha ki mere ko payment karni thi na aapki kuch.
Executive: Ha ha wo to payment sab baki hai aapka pata hai catalog temp block ho gaya tha. I thought aapko bataya bhi gaya hoga. Main chutti pe thi maine mail karwaya kal parso ki please unka temp block hatwa dijiye main payment aake karwa lungi.
Pata hai wo temp block ho jata hai deal amount agar nahi aata hai na to fir aapka aise temp block ho gaya to aapki listing me wo impact karta hai. Isiliye humne turant usko hatwaya. I thought aapko unhone bataya bhi hoga Deepak ne kya naam hai unka. Ha Deepak ne right.
Customer: Deepak pata nahi kaun hai mere ko idea nahi hai. Wo aapki madam hai wo thoda sa alag tarike se baat kar rahi thi mere se.
Executive: Oh so Ashima Ashima ji ha. Wo hamari madam hai ha.
Executive: To chaliye main aapko link bhej do screen pe scan karke bhej diya.
Customer: Ha madam.
Customer: Ha ha ha.
Customer: Kya kare.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: Achcha.
Customer: Mere ko number bhejo zara ek bari.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Ha mam batao. Kitna amount reh gaya mam abhi wala?
Executive: Ek minute sir.
Customer: Inka ek do din ke andar payment kar dunga main.
Executive: ₹59384.
Customer: Ye balance reh gaya hai?
Executive: Bas itna hi hai.
Customer: Kitna bataya 59?
Executive: ₹59384 jo pehle ka bhi hai aur abhi ka pura including hai. Aisa nahi ki iske baad aapko aur dena hai. Yahi hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha. To madam ek to hai na aapko bana ke bhej do. Ek to do din ruko abhi ruko abhi abhi scanner mat banao. Do din ke baad scanner bana dena aadhi payment ka.
Executive: Sir wo aadhi aaj hi aadhi de.
Customer: Are madam pressure mat dalo mere pe aane do payment mere ko payment dalni hai. Suno suno suno meri baat hai ki madam.
Executive: Meri baat suniye sir.
Customer: Karo. Abhi mere ko pata hai mere ko sab kuch pata hai mam mere ko pata diya tha kaise expire kaise ho gaya tha ji kya baat ho gayi.
Executive: Sir wo bahut time se na bimar the matlab March me unki aisi condition thi ki wo chale hi jayenge. Itna jyada bimar the matlab unko na thoda sa cancer ki problem ho rakhi thi. Thik hai to unke symptoms aa gaye the ab wo chal hi rahe the bas wo ghar pe sochiye chal rahe the unka ek pura hospitalize. Mam kahan rehte ho aap? Rehte hain Kanpur ki hun Kanpur.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Achcha Kanpur se ho yahan reh rahe ho yahan pe ya phir.
Executive: Ha yahan Noida me reh rahi hun sir. Yahan pe flat hai yahan pe reh rahi hun ha.
Customer: To mummy daddy wahi pe rehte hain na.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir family wahi pe Kanpur me hai sirf main yahan pe reh rahi hun. Oho. Bas matlab job ke purpose se hi.
Customer: Ha sirf job ke purpose se hi reh rahi hun.
Customer: Are yaar.
Executive: To bas aise hi aaya to fir main gayi ab mere pass Rakhi ji ka call jab main aayi tab main ki mera ye phone na ye flat me hi reh gaya tha office wala isliye main kisi ka bhi kuch answer nahi kar pa rahi thi bas mere personal number pe Deepak ka jab message aaya jo aapke abhi currently account manager hai ki sir ki kuch problem hai kuch queries hai to maine unko bas itna bola sir ko bas itna bol dijiyega ye problem hai sir samajh jayenge.
Customer: Nahi nahi mere pass phone bol diya tha unhone mere ko ye cheez.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Koi nahi main aapko na do din ruk jao do din ke andar na aadhi payment to main kara dunga do din me. Fir jo balance rahega na wo month tak to hai hi to kar dunga main usi.
Executive: Ha matlab hai bas sir thoda matlab koshish kare ki aaj itni aadhi karwa dijiye taki main thoda sa aage. Main nahi abhi dekho main abhi nahi abhi nahi jo cheez hai jo cheez hai main us cheez ko bol raha hun do din me payment ikhatti karke na main fir aapko khud phone kar lunga fir aap dal dena.
Executive: Sir do din me bhi aap aadhi karwaoge do din me to kam se kam puri karwa dete.
Customer: Do din time. Ab ye jo ye jo ye jo problem hui hai na pehle isko handle karo baki baat baad me karenge ab.
Executive: Ha thik hai. Koi nahi ab aapne bola hai sir to main aaj Monday kal kal ya parso karoge.
Customer: Wednesday Wednesday me kar dena mere ko Wednesday me.
Executive: Thik hai sir aap zuban dijiye sir main fir matlab call karu main kyuki. Wednesday ko kar lena main karta hun Wednesday me kar raha hun.
Executive: Chaliye koi nahi sir main aapko call karti hun aap please kar dijiyega okay.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs to make a payment.

- Wants to pay half amount in two days.



Resolution:

- Executive informed about catalog temp block.

- Executive shared the outstanding amount.

- Executive agreed to receive payment in two days.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will make half payment in two days.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, catalog, block, outstanding amount
